dcterms:creator: S. Kaul
R. Yates
M. Gruteser
dcterms:description: A dataset that evaluates the freshness of information in status update systems, defined as the difference between the current time and the generation time of the last received packet.
dcterms:title: Age of Information (AoI)

dcterms:creator: M. A. Abd-Elmagid
N. Pappas
H. S. Dhillon
dcterms:description: A dataset that discusses the role of age of information in the Internet of Things, focusing on how timely updates affect system performance.
dcterms:title: Age of Information (AoI)

dcterms:creator: S. K. Kaul
R. D. Yates
M. Gruteser
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores status updates through queues, providing insights into the dynamics of information freshness in networked systems.
dcterms:title: Age of Information (AoI)

dcterms:creator: R. D. Yates
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a comprehensive analysis of the age of information in networks, including its moments, distributions, and sampling techniques.
dcterms:title: Age of Information (AoI)

dcterms:creator: A. Kosta
N. Pappas
V. Angelakis
dcterms:description: A dataset that introduces the concept of age of information as a new metric and tool for evaluating the performance of communication systems.
dcterms:title: Age of Information (AoI)

dcterms:creator: S. Lin
D. J. Costello
M. J. Miller
dcterms:description: A dataset that discusses automatic-repeat-request error-control schemes, providing foundational knowledge for understanding HARQ protocols.
dcterms:title: HARQ Protocols

dcterms:description: A dataset that outlines the IEEE standard for air interface for broadband wireless access systems, relevant for understanding HARQ implementations.
dcterms:title: HARQ Protocols

dcterms:creator: E. T. Ceran
D. Gündüz
A. György
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents a reinforcement learning approach to managing age of information in multi-user networks utilizing HARQ.
dcterms:title: AoI in Multi-Source Systems

dcterms:creator: E. T. Ceran
D. Gündüz
A. György
dcterms:description: A dataset that analyzes the average age of information with hybrid ARQ under resource constraints, providing insights into system performance.
dcterms:title: Age of Information with HARQ

dcterms:creator: E. Najm
R. Yates
E. Soljanin
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates status updates through M/G/1/1 queues with HARQ, contributing to the understanding of information freshness.
dcterms:title: HARQ Protocols
